cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CE, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with a variant of the contextual bandit problem, which is a well-studied problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper proposes algorithms for this problem and analyzes their regret bounds, which are common topics in the subfield of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The problem also involves linear regression, which is a fundamental technique in data science (cs.DS). The paper mentions applications in network routing and crowd-sourcing, which are topics in computer engineering (cs.CE). Finally, the paper involves optimization and analysis of algorithms, which are topics in information theory (cs.IT).
